handleEvent

public void handleEvent(Message event)
Handles all message events sent to the bot. Only private messages sent by s or higher will be processed.

Overrides:
handleEvent in class TWBotExtension
Parameters:

fuzzyStringArraySearch

public int fuzzyStringArraySearch(java.lang.String[] stringArray,
                                  java.lang.String target)
Implements a fuzzy search on an array of strings.

Parameters:
stringArray - is the array of strings to search.
target - is the target string to find.
Returns:
if the target is found, then the index is returned. If not then -1 is returned.

getPrizeName

public java.lang.String getPrizeName(int prizeNumber)
Gets the name of the prize from the prize number.

Parameters:
prizeNumber - is prize whose name is to be retrieved.
Returns:
the name of the prize. If the prize is negative then the string "Negative" will be prepended to the name.

getArgTokens

public java.util.StringTokenizer getArgTokens(java.lang.String string)
Gets the argument tokens from a string. If there are no colons in the string then the delimeter will default to space.

Parameters:
string - is the string to tokenize.
Returns:
a tokenizer separating the arguments is returned.

getInterval

public double getInterval(java.lang.String intervalString)
Gets the interval between prizing from a string in seconds.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the interval is smaller than the minimum interval (MIN_INTERVAL) or is equal or less than 0.

getFreq

public int getFreq(java.lang.String freqString)
Gets the freq to prize from a string.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the freq is smaller than 0 or greater than 9999.

getShip

public int getShip(java.lang.String shipString)
Gets the ship type to prize from a string.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the ship is less than 1 or greater than 8.

doPrizeAll

public void doPrizeAll(java.lang.String sender,
                       java.lang.String argString)
Prizes all players in the arena. There must be either one or two arguments in the argString and they must be separated by either a space or a colon. The arguments are as follows: Argument 1: The prize number. Argument 2: The interval between prizing.

Parameters:
argString - is the string containing the arguments for the command.

doPrizeFreq

public void doPrizeFreq(java.lang.String sender,
                        java.lang.String argString)
Prizes all players on a specific freq. There must be either two or three arguments in the argString and they must be separated by either a space or a colon. The arguments are as follows: Argument 1: The prize number. Argument 2: The freq to prize to. Argument 3: The interval between prizes.

Parameters:
argString - is the string containing the arguments for the command.

doPrizeShip

public void doPrizeShip(java.lang.String sender,
                        java.lang.String argString)
Prizes all the ships of a specific type. There must be either two or three arguments in the argString and they must be separated by either a space or a colon. The arguments are as follows: Argument 1: The prize number. Argument 2: The ship to prize to. Argument 3: The interval between prizes.

Parameters:
argString - is the string containing the arguments for the command.

doPrizePlayer

public void doPrizePlayer(java.lang.String sender,
                          java.lang.String argString)
Prizes a specific player. There must be either two or three arguments in the argString and they must be separated by a colon. The arguments are as follows: Argument 1: The prize number. Argument 2: The player to prize. Argument 3: The interval between prizes.

Parameters:
argString - is the string containing the arguments for the command.

getPrizeIndex

public int getPrizeIndex(java.lang.String prizeTaskString)
Gets the index of the prize in the timerTask list.

Parameters:
prizeTaskString - is the String of the task to get.
Returns:
the index of the task in the timerTask list is returned.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the prize number isnt found in the timerTask list.
